source.9dd248e5:
All the countries in top 5 are higher than those of FIFA ranking, for example,
* Spain and England are ranked 1st in potential ranking compared to 8th and 3rd in FIFA ranking.
* France is also ranked 3rd in potential ranking compared to 4th in FIFA ranking.
source.348ccae1:
1) Objective

This is FIFA ranking as of 10th October, 2021.

![image.png](attachment:38d7becc-18ab-4edc-bdb6-fdb4315014e6.png)

I tried to find which countries have a lot of high potential football players. It may contrubute to next world cup. This time, I define 'high potential' as young which is under 23 and high potential score.

2) Approach
*  Get the data which includes 'only under 23 players' and  sorted by 'Potential'. There are 7,873 young players listed. I think top 10%, 787 players, are highest potential.
*  Grouped top 10% by countries.
*  I also tried to find the segmentation model by which we can predict potential of under 23.

3) Result

Potential ranking

1st


![spain.png](attachment:e6c9b23e-03c8-4b33-b9cd-5cb8d17453c3.png)


1st(same score)

![england.png](attachment:98493cb5-f5f8-4acc-9a76-d96a02da6a1f.png)


3rd

![france.png](attachment:52efde3f-ed09-4856-838a-2f17d2a89d16.png)


And by Clustering of under 23 players, I got 4 clusters and Cluster 1 includes only top 8 players who are the highest potential young players.

![image.png](attachment:8e634eeb-6aba-462d-abeb-26309917e6b4.png)
